::Spears::

She could hear the structure of the ship yawn and moan under the 
stress and abuse it had taken. "Ah, guys, now might be a good time to 
get out of here." she heard a crash somewhere down the hall from 
parts of the structure caving in. "HEY GUYS, Let's get going?"
